name: Little Indie Games Journey
description:
Oh hey there...

Enter into a small idle journey into trying to become an indie game dev who earns enough for food and shelter each day! A mysterious Face guides the way, but is he as he appears?

14/7/21 - Note: The game is centered around the dialog it uses to set up a scenario, it's not an abstract number puzzle - if you're used to skipping quest text to go straight to play this game might no suit you. I know I skipped a lot of quest text when I was playing wow. Might make a game latter on about skipping quest text, seems a funny topic to get into!

Genre: Simple semi idle game
Play time: About 30 minutes
Controls: Mouse or Spacebar
Made over 24 non consecutive hours

Free way to make a small payment - Make a free bitcoin claim here: https://freebitco.in/?r=1495271
